name: MARO: A Legend From The Space
name_original: MARO: A Legend From The Space
description:
Modifications: 

  1. I've added 2 cutscenes in the game
  2. I've built a dialogue system which appears clearly at the victory moment!
  3. I've created a boss level
  4. I have changed the materials of the weapons to be more attractive
  5. I've added fog
  6. "Sirx" which is the name of a character in the game always looking at the player! wherever he goes!
  7. The main menu background is alive with a lot of different enemies!
  8. I've added Naruto sad OST in the last scene and a hunter X hunter OST in the first level and the main menu scene
